code: import{PROJECT_DATA_REQUEST,PROJECT_DATA_SUCCESS,PROJECT_DATA_FAIL,PROJECT_DETAILS_REQUEST,PROJECT_DETAILS_SUCCESS,SELECT_PROJECT,PROJECT_DETAILS_FAIL,PROJECT_DATA_LOGOUT,REMOVE_SELECT_PROJECT,ARCHIVED_PROJECT_REQUEST,ARCHIVED_PROJECT_SUCCESS,ARCHIVED_PROJECT_FAIL,ARCHIVED_PROJECT_REMOVE,PROJECT_DETAILS_DELETE}from"../constants/projectConstants";export var userProjectReducer=function userProjectReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{project:[]};var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case PROJECT_DATA_REQUEST:return{loading:true,project:[]};case PROJECT_DATA_SUCCESS:return{loading:false,project:action.payload};case PROJECT_DATA_FAIL:return{loading:false,error:action.payload};case PROJECT_DATA_LOGOUT:return{project:[]};default:return state;}};export var projectDetailsReducer=function projectDetailsReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{projectDetails:[]};var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case PROJECT_DETAILS_REQUEST:return{loading:true,projectDetails:[]};case PROJECT_DETAILS_SUCCESS:return{loading:false,projectDetails:action.payload};case PROJECT_DETAILS_FAIL:return{loading:false,error:action.payload};case PROJECT_DETAILS_DELETE:return{projectDetails:[]};default:return state;}};export var archivedProjectReducer=function archivedProjectReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{archivedProject:[]};var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case ARCHIVED_PROJECT_REQUEST:return{loading:true,archivedProject:[]};case ARCHIVED_PROJECT_SUCCESS:return{loading:false,archivedProject:action.payload};case ARCHIVED_PROJECT_FAIL:return{loading:false,error:action.payload};case ARCHIVED_PROJECT_REMOVE:return{archivedProject:[]};default:return state;}};
